notes: It is not easy to download automatically. So we download it manually and then put the installer in local path.
The URL defined in bucket file must be absolute except the drive letter and include installer file name.
Go to the bucket directory and run ‘checkver lc_pdmaner -u’ to get the latest version information. It will update the file name descripted above.
The default path is '\Scoop\local_installer', assume running scoop in the same drive. Please ensure it is correct before calling scoop.
